    Kivu Geophysics Project

    Multidisciplinary research into transient rifting behavior

    About

    During a large eruption at Nyiragongo volcano in the eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, a large rift opening event propagated several km southward toward and possibly below Lake Kivu.
